To help, we have compiled this list of both on- campus and off-campus resources. If you are part of a group that's not represented here, or if you know of a great resource that should be listed here, please contact Jonna (Cottrell) McHugh to let her know.       UIC Diversity Portal       Groups     LGBTQIA    UIC Gender and Sexuality Center    Corporate Equality Index - Rating Workplaces on LGBTQ Equality    Transgender in the Workplace    LGBT Connect - Job Board    Out Professionals - LGBT Networking Organization      Veterans/Military    UIC Student Veteran Affairs    My Next Move - tool for exploring civilian careers    Military.com - Job Board    Student Veterans of America - Job Board      DACA/Undocumented    UIC Latino Cultural Center - DACA & Undocumented Student Support    UIC Resources for Undocumented Students    Immigrants Rising Transforming Lives through Education    Applying for an ITIN - Fact Sheet    Employment Rights with DACA      Students With Disabilities    UIC Disability Resource Center    UIC Office for Access and Equity Disability Resources    UIC Disability Cultural Center    Job Accommodation Network    Job Hero - Career Resources for Americans with Disabilities    Job Portal for Persons with Disabilities    Your Rights Under the ADA    HBCU Disability Consortium - What Do I Tell Employers?
